# Comprehensions in Python

Comprehensions are a concise way to create lists, sets, and dictionaries in Python. They provide a syntactically elegant way to generate collections from existing iterables. In this section, we will explore list comprehensions, set comprehensions, and dictionary comprehensions, along with their applications in functional programming.
